content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences or watch videos, but I'm designed to provide information and answer questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'm thrilled to hear that you're using Crash Course videos to improve your understanding of current events and news! That's a great way to apply what you learn and make it more meaningful and relevant to your life.

Using educational resources like Crash Course to inform your understanding of current events can be incredibly empowering. By understanding the historical context, scientific principles, or cultural nuances behind a news article or event, you can develop a more nuanced and informed perspective.

It's fantastic that you're taking the initiative to learn and apply what you learn to real-life situations. Keep up the great work, and I'm sure you'll continue to develop a deeper understanding of the world around you!

If you have any more questions or topics you'd like to discuss, feel free to ask!
